content.text:
# List of states in the Holy Roman Empire (P)

This is a list of states in the Holy Roman Empire beginning with the letter P:
{| class="wikitable sortable"
|-
! Name
! Type
! Imperial circle
! Imperial diet
! width=50% | History
|-
|  Paderborn
| style="background:#69f" | Bishopric
| Low Rhen
| EC
| 799: Formed881: Granted territory in fief to Saxony1180: Made fief of the Archbishopric of Cologne1281: Imperial immediacy; HRE Prince of the Empire1802: To Prussia1807: To Westphalia1813: To Prussia
|-
